title: I can't login
body:
I can login in this league home page, but I can't login in the leauge app (game). 
I have right username and the password. what do I do? please help I want to play LOL.

replies.body: maybe try deleting the game and reinstalling it, or try clearing the cache

It doesn't look like this account is banned or anything so you're alright on that note. Double check that you've got the right region selected and if that doesn't help let me know what kind of error you're getting.
